subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez, a Spaniard riding for Katusha, extended his lead over Christopher Froome and Alberto Contador by surging late to win the sixth stage of the Vuelta a España.
snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez, a Spaniard riding for Katusha, extended his lead over Christopher Froome and Alberto Contador by surging late to win the sixth stage of the Vuelta a España.
